评论概述: Be careful and stay on top of your orders
评论详情: Material and fabric softness was right. Sleeves length was off a slightly compared to the other side. I liked the colors. Got email that said a few times that my order was being sent. Got another email that said delay in shipment so they weren’t going to charge until I got my order. I sent them email stating accordingly to my bank they already asked for their money without me getting merchandise. I know my bank very well and would take care of me. It was a little unprofessional to keep getting emails stating that I was getting delivered again only to get another one next saying delayed again . That’s why I only gave three stars on this shirt

评论详情: I can’t believe this blouse is such an amazing fit, beautifully made and just perfect in every way. So inexpensive I was prepared to be disappointed. Instead was and remain surprised & delighted!
Very comfy, washed well.
Cute top! Runs true to size.
Love love love!!! True to size!
The size was way too small for a 2x shirt. I gave it to my friend and she is a size medium. Will not buy a again.
RUNS very small, not very well made. Wound  not buy again. Not warm.not flattering.

评论概述: Beautiful blouse and nice fabric but had to return because I could not get a good fit!!
评论详情: Ordered a medium and it was too tight at the hips.  Ordered a large and it was way too large at the wrists!  So I returned both of them sadly!
soft material, enjoy wearing
I have ordered this top in several different colors.. It's comfortable and washes well. True to size.
I feel like I should have known by now. The material is some sort of cheap blend that pills and sticks to itself when washed. I get tricked by the picture sometimes.

This is an incredible value for a decent shirt. The color is gorgeous, and as pictured. The seams are interesting, and the cut is great. I love that it's long enough for those of us with a bit of a long torso. My only complaint is the quality of the fabric. It's soft and easy to steam out of the back, but after 5-10 washes, it's looking a little worn.
I really like the design and color of this shirt.

评论概述: Pretty, but disappointed in size description.
评论详情: Ordered my normal size, and this top was a lot tighter than my others I've ordered.  Will keep it, as I'm doing GOLO to lose weight, and hopefully, it won't be so clingy or tight soon, but it' really not true to size.
I do love this top and have gotten multiple compliments on it. It does run slightly small. I ordered a M but it was a little tighter than I like so returned it and ordered a L.  Perfect!
Color, fit, fabric
Love this top. Nice thick fabric, pretty print, a bit snug across bust but next size larger is way too wide across the shoulders. All in all. I’m pleased with this purchase.
I like the way it feels.
Top ok but not as soft as expected No stretch or give. Not flattering. Neck a little to high. Not sure what else to say.  Would not order again.

Very nice blouse at a good price. Fabric is really nice. If you're debating between two sizes go with the bigger size.

Love love, love this top. it is so comfortable to wear.  So soft and the sleeves are so pretty with the cuffed bottom on them. I ordered another one in a different color and pattern. Highly recommend

Fits great.  I have long arms and the sleeves are perfect.

True to size and very comfortable. Washes well and does not shrink. Flattering fit and light weight.

Finally!! A top that is the right length everywhere. Sleeves and hangs perfectly. Looks cute on!

Very soft, flattering blouse!  Sleeves ate easyto push up as elastic is not too tight!  Great value and is true to size.

I love this shirt. It was on sale, so I grabbed it for work. I wish I would have gotten one in every color. The material is soft and good quality. The details make this very feminine and trendy. Cute for jeans or dress slacks. Versatile.

I love this shirt. It’s soft against my skin and has a silky feel. The dainty little flowers are so feminine. It’s wrinkle resistant, fits well and shows off my waist!  It’s a great value for the money. Oh and the elastic around the wrist makes a little ruffle and it’s so cute!

评论概述: Fits to size, smooth and comfortable and is not see through.
评论详情: I like the fit and feel of the fabric.
Me gusta es stretch

I am 5'2 110lbs and ordered the medium because I don't want a tight fit due to surgery.  This top is so cute and comfortable. I wear it with my leggings. Washes up nice in warm water with no shrinkage. Do not have to iron this top if you hang it up after drying. I dry in the dryer on medium heat but I also use the delicate cycle more often. Nice top and great with leggings.

I ordered the Women's 2024 Fall Long Sleeve Top because of the pretty color arrangement. This is a cute top for the upcoming fall season. I especially like the elastic on the end of the sleeves for a different look. The material is soft and lightweight. The length could be a bit longer for a tunic style. This is a professional style top that I can wear to work in the classroom. This top is also affordable currently priced under $15. I would purchase additional clothing items from this company.
I wear a 2x and it was way to tight
I love this shirt so much. It feels like a tshirt but is beautifully embellished. Highly reccomend! I'm ordering more.
This is a great shirt to dress up or down. It’s very soft and comfy. The fit is perfect.
Didn’t fit. Picture looked more fuller.

This is a flattering g top that fits true to size. I really like this forest green color. The bottom is longer and curves which I really like as well. It’s a lighter weight and perfect for fall. I recommend it.

评论概述: A well made top for cooler weather
评论详情: This is t-shirt material and the style is a little different which is why I got it. It has a higher neckline with pleats radiating from it, higher than I usually wear but it is passable to me. The color is a darker green than I thought it would be, kind of muted dark green. I wanted some different colors and this qualifies for that. It fits well and is long enough to cover your tummy. Nice shirt.
Fits as expected. 5'7" 170lb, got a large. The pattern and color just didn't work for me, which is at no fault of the shirt. Its nice material and fits as expected.
Well made and super comfortable!  I love the detail around the neckline and the ruffled sleeves are a nice unique detail.  Bright white and medium weight.  Loose fitting and true to size.

评论概述: Nice casual shirt that can work for many workplaces
评论详情: Great shirt-- it's super comfortable and soft, not too heavy-- nice for fall/spring or if you need modest for summer. Has some details at the cuffs and color that make it interesting. I got the pink floral which has additional interest because of the pattern. The pink is not too bright and has a bit of a peach undertone (while still being pink).  Washed well in regular wash and dryer. Fit was true to size (I got an XL- my normal size).  This would be nice for running errands and weekends with family. I work in a school setting so for me this is also a great, comfy shirt that can work for work.  Good value!

评论概述: Nice quality and true to size; looks great
评论详情: This top is a very nice quality printed fabric and runs true to size. I am happy with the fit and comfort.  It washed very well in cold water.  The tag suggests both options of washing or for better results to Dry Clean.

I ordered the Pink Black Floral print. I think I would call it peach, rather than pink. It is a pretty top, with just a bit of detail at the top. It is long, which I do like for cooler weather. I would say it is less roomy in the midriff than some other shirts, but it is not fitted. It is a soft knit which I think will look good even after multiple washings.

PROS: 1) This shirt is multi-colored so it will match many different pants or jeans. 2) The front pleating allows a little more room in the stomach and chest area. 3) The material is very silky and medium weight, it is not see-through. 4) The shoulder seams are where they are supposed to be (not halfway down your arm). 5) The sleeves on most tops tend to be long on me, but the elastic cuffs prevent this issue. 6) After washing and line drying the top maintained its shape.  CONS: None at this time.

评论概述: Ribbed Design From Neck Elevates Top's Design
评论详情: I am really looking forward to wearing this top once the temps cool down enough. I typically buy a size or two larger than most normally would, simply because I like my tops to fit a bit more loosely. This blouse works great in the size that I ordered. The scooped hemline helps with the easier fit. The puff at the shoulder of the sleeves is small (thank goodness), so no worries about fashion "donts" with this one. I like the ribbed design on the front from the neckline. As soon as I tried it on, I thought how nice this blouse would be for any dressing up occasion. (Or dress up some jeans for a day of shopping.) I'm not a fan of the long, ruffled cuffs - they feel weird on my wrists and arms. They are not tight and restrictive but do seem tight enough that they will hold at the spot near my elbows where I inevitably manage to push all my long sleeves. Lol The material is lightweight and will be perfect once the temps finally cool down into Autumn.
This is a cute, comfortable top. I think it is good for a business/business casual environment and it can be dressed up or down. It fits true to size and washed and dried nicely.

评论概述: More Fitted than Loose Casual Tunic Style Top
评论详情: My wife likes the style of this black background with multi-colored floral pattern tunic top and says that the elastic cuffs keep the sleeves in place. It is a nice casual look, and it does fit to size but is a bit more fitted than my wife usually likes.

评论概述: This will be a go-to top in my closet!
评论详情: So cute! It's a soft, comfortable cotton/polyester fabric with super cute detailing. I normally wear a medium and this fit me just as I would expect a medium to. It isn't really quite as long as most tunic tops, but the length is sufficient and it's got a relaxed flow. I have very tiny wrists so the cute elastic detailing at the wrists doesn't bother me, but I could see that possibly being tight, and maybe annoying or uncomfortable, if you have a larger wrist. It went through the wash great and I just hung it to dry, because there wasn't a wrinkle on it. It's a very cute print, really comfy, stylish, and a great value. Winner!

评论概述: Nice top, but not as long/loose as pictured
评论详情: This long sleeve top is cute, but it isn't a long flowy tunic like it is in the pictures. I'm 5'6" and I wouldn't be comfortable wearing this with leggings because it isn't long enough. I do like the elastic on the sleeves though, it dresses this top up a bit.
Very cute shirt but it does run a little small.

评论概述: A pretty and stylish blouse to add to your collection
评论详情: What a nice comfortable top this is. Being that I am retired. I like to be comfortable  in my clothes and my this top is perfect. The  pleats At the top of it sure give the blouse a better fit that is actually a little slimming. The fabric itself is beautiful. It is so soft and comfortable. It washed perfectly. It dried beautifully as long as you take it out as soon as the dryer stops. Super comfortable, worn outside of jeans or stretch pants and stylish enough for various ages. A definite value in a woman’s top

评论概述: No Fabric ID On Tag Or In Listing
评论详情: This review is for the "Uhiger Women's 2024 Fall Long Sleeve Tops Crewneck..." This top is supposed to be Cotton/Polyester but there is no fabric content in the listing or on the item. I hate that as I like to know what I am wearing. The tag says machine wash but then shows dry clean for best results. That is kind of a joke. I don't know anyone who would dry clean a $15 top like this. I washed and dried without any issue or shrinkage. I usually order large and large fit well. I don't care for the smocked sleeves but I may like them better as the weather is colder. I usually push up sleeves and these work well for that. One star off for lack of fabric ID.

Trying to add to my wardrobe for fallen winter. Found this long sleeve black top. It has pleats from the neckline. The material is soft and stretchy. It fits/hangs loose around my stomach, which is nice because I have a bit of a pooch. I am 5‘4“, 128 pounds, I ordered a small and it fits well.
Wish it was looser at the bottom but it’s cute.
Great fit.  Soft material.  Did well through the wash.  The only thing I personally do not like is the way the wrists are made.  They are scratchy, hence the reason for the 4 star rating.

I'm glad I sized up because this fits just right. It's very comfortable and flattering, in that it doesn't just hang like a tent. :-)  I'm ready for cooler weather so that I can wear this with my jeans. You could dress this up for the office, or down for casual occasions. Very versatile.

I ordered this tunic in the color "Color: Pink Black Floral" and size small.  The color is pretty, and I think it is more pinkish-peach rather than pure pink.  I am 5'4" 115lb, 34" bust, and usually order tops and dresses in the size small, and this "small" tunic fits me perfectly. I especially like the long sleeves with smocked cuff which ends just at my wrist. It is hard to find long sleeve tops where the sleeves are the right length, and I am glad these sleeves are perfect for me.  The tunic length is modest and the crew neck detailing with pleats adds a special touch. I also like the curved hemline.  The fabric is light and comfortable against the skin. It is slightly stretchy. I could not find any information on the exact fabric composition, either on the Amazon product page or product tag; this information would be really good and useful for customers to know.  The workmanship and finishing details on this garment are good. I'd recommend this tunic based on the quality and price.

This is a nice quality shirt. It feels great on. It is made of light-medium fabric that is airy and feels so comfortable to wear. The size is fine; however, if you have a tummy, you might want to get a size up. It's not tight; however, it has a slender fit. It has good length around the mid-range of the hips and comes down long on the sleeves. It is a versatile and attractive shirt to wear.

This blouse is so soft I can hardly wait for cooler weather to wear it.  It fits true to size and is quite comfy. I tried it on with leggings, jeans, shorts, dress pants, and a skirt. I like it best with jeans or leggings. I guess you could wear it to work as well, but I just preferred the look of it with jeans or leggings. It is long enough to cover your behind, in case you are a bit modest about that.  I also love that the sleeves are long enough. I like them a bit longer to give me some room to twist and turn. It's a great top!
